title: Léon: The Professional
plot: After her father, step-mother, step-sister and little brother are killed by her father's employers, the 12-year-old daughter of an abject drug dealer manages to take refuge in the apartment of a professional hitman who at her request teaches her the methods of his job so she can take her revenge on the corrupt DEA agent who ruined her life by killing her beloved brother.
stars: Jean Reno, Gary Oldman, Natalie Portman, Danny Aiello

others.job: Second Unit Director or Assistant Director

tagline: A perfect assassin. An innocent girl. They have nothing left to lose except each other. He moves without sound. Kills without emotion. Disappears without trace. Only a 12 year old girl... knows his weakness.
keywords: girl,hitman,teenage girl,older man young girl relationship,neo noir

similars.title: Se7en
similars.plot: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
similars.stars: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey

similars.title: The Green Mile
similars.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
similars.stars: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse

similars.title: American History X
similars.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
similars.stars: Edward Norton, Edward Furlong, Beverly D'Angelo

similars.title: Fight Club
similars.plot: A nameless first person narrator (Edward Norton) attends support groups in attempt to subdue his emotional state and relieve his insomniac state. When he meets Marla (Helena Bonham Carter),... See full summary »
similars.stars: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf

similars.title: The Silence of the Lambs
similars.plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
similars.stars: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney

similars.title: The Usual Suspects
similars.plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.
similars.stars: Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne, Chazz Palminteri

similars.title: Pulp Fiction
similars.plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
similars.stars: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

similars.title: The Pianist
similars.plot: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.
similars.stars: Adrien Brody, Thomas Kretschmann, Frank Finlay

similars.title: Forrest Gump
similars.plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
similars.stars: Tom Hanks, Robin Wright, Gary Sinise

similars.title: Gladiator
similars.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
similars.stars: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen

similars.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
similars.fullTitle: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975)
similars.plot: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.
similars.stars: Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Michael Berryman

similars.title: The Matrix
similars.plot: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
similars.stars: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
